channel.title: PythonControl on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in PythonControl on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Introduction of data driven controller design method
item.description: #Introduction Feedback control has been used to “control” everything from home appliances to industrial equipment. A device that performs this control is called a controller, and various design methods have been considered. This time, I would like to introduce a relatively new approach called “data-driven controller design method”. I will leave the theoretical part to the paper and write it focusing on the use. So, I’d like to explain it while mixing the code of MATLAB and Python.
